author: stevel
msg: put back the log4j version. I'd pulled it cos I thought we;d moved past 1.2.4, but we havent and the CVS log shows someone felt it was important enough to version in the docs, so I will be consistent.

author: stevel
msg: major rework of install docs, including tomcat specifics, moving tests ahead of adding a new service, plus use of the GET tests to see what works from a web browser.

We should something about the adminclient and soap client examples, as axis-users seem to skip the comments about setting up the classpath. My own preference is for an adminclient web page or two for Posting of the file

author: stevel
msg: Sort the books by pub date, list axis version used. harsh but fair.

author: tomj
msg: Fix a problem reported by Ed Snible [snible@us.ibm.com]
I discovered the problem trying to deploy in AXIS a "dynamic proxy class"
ClassReader.getBytes() throws a null pointer exception if
Class.getResourceAsStream() returns null -- not an IOException.
IOException.  Thus, the comment is wrong: the parameter names can't be
read, but the method throws an exception rather than returning null.

author: stevel
msg: patch .css file into the other docs.
